tests.prompt: Verify you can create an empty GameContext and it has a valid CharacterRegistry (not nil)
Verify you can add a character with equipped weapons to the registry and retrieve it by ID
Verify WithGameContext wraps a context.Context and Characters()/RequireCharacters() can retrieve the registry
Verify CharacterWeapons.MainHand() returns the equipped main hand weapon
Verify CharacterWeapons.OffHand() returns the equipped off-hand weapon (or nil if none/shield)
Verify CharacterWeapons.AllEquipped() returns all equipped weapons
Character with one-handed melee weapon and no off-hand item should be Dueling eligible (+2 damage)
Character with one-handed melee weapon and shield should be Dueling eligible (+2 damage)
Character with two-handed weapon should NOT be Dueling eligible (no damage bonus)
Character with weapon in each hand should NOT be Dueling eligible (no damage bonus)
Run go test ./gamectx/... and verify all tests pass
Run make pre-commit and verify it passes
